text: Abo ke ngabo uAllâh Wathululela phezu kwabo uBabalo lwaKhe phakathi kwabaProfeti abayinzala ka-Adam nabo bathwalwa yinqanawa bekunye noNûh (uNowa) nabayinzala kaIbrâhîm (uAbraham) noSirayeli (UYa’kûb), neyabo Sabakhokelayo Sabakhetha. Zazisithi iiVesi zikaSozinceba zisakucengcelezwa kubo, bawe baqubude balile
